cooking_method: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, while cooking pancetta in a pan. Whisk together egg yolks, parmesan cheese, and black pepper in a bowl. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat and add egg mixture, stirring until creamy. Serve immediately.

Slice beef into thin strips and cook in a pan until browned. Remove from pan and cook onions and mushrooms until tender. Add beef broth and bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer. Add sour cream and beef, stirring until heated through. Serve over egg noodles.
Grill chicken and slice into strips. Toss together romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Add chicken on top and serve.

Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente, while cooking pancetta in a pan. Whisk together egg yolks, parmesan cheese, and black pepper in a bowl. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with pancetta. Remove from heat and add egg mixture, stirring until creamy. Serve immediately.

Slice beef into thin strips and cook in a pan until browned. Remove from pan and cook onions and mushrooms until tender. Add beef broth and bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer. Add sour cream and beef, stirring until heated through. Serve over egg noodles.
Grill chicken and slice into strips. Toss together romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Add chicken on top and serve.

Boil ziti in salted water until al dente. Mix tomato sauce with ricotta cheese and half of the mozzarella cheese. Combine pasta with sauce mixture in a baking dish, and top with remaining mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Bake at 375°F for 20-25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Brown ground beef in a pan and add taco seasoning. Warm taco shells in the oven. Fill each shell with beef, lettuce, and tomato. Serve immediately.

Cook rice according to package directions. Heat oil in a wok or large pan and add garlic and ginger. Add mixed vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce and continue cooking until heated through. Serve over rice.
Slice beef into thin strips and cook in a pan until browned. Remove from pan and cook garlic and broccoli until tender. Add soy sauce and beef, stirring until heated through. Serve over rice.
Boil pasta in salted water until al dente. Drain and toss with basil pesto. Add halved cherry tomatoes, parmesan cheese, and pine nuts. Serve warm or chilled.

Preheat oven to 375°F. Rub chicken with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Stuff with garlic, rosemary, and lemon. Roast in oven for 1 to 1 1/2 hours, or until cooked through. Let rest for 10 minutes before carving.

Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, cook garlic in butter until fragrant. Add shrimp and cook until pink. Add white wine and simmer until slightly reduced. Toss with cooked pasta and serve.
Brown beef in a pan and add taco seasoning. Toss with lettuce, chopped tomatoes, and grated cheddar cheese. Serve with tortilla chips and sour cream.
Slice chicken, bell peppers, and onions into thin strips. Cook in a pan until chicken is browned and vegetables are tender. Serve with warm tortillas and salsa.

Preheat oven to 375°F. Mix spinach, feta cheese, and garlic in a bowl. Cut a pocket in the thickest part of each chicken breast and stuff with the spinach mixture. Rub with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until cooked through.
Slice beef into thin strips and brown in a pan. Remove beef and cook onion and mushrooms until tender. Add beef back to the pan and stir in sour cream. Serve over cooked egg noodles.
Heat oil in a pan and add vegetables. Cook until tender-crisp. Stir in soy sauce and serve over rice.

Preheat oven to 400°F. Place salmon in a baking dish and squeeze lemon over it. Mix dill, mayonnaise, and garlic in a bowl and spread over the top of the salmon. Bake for 15-20 minutes, or until cooked through.

Preheat oven to 400°F. Dip chicken in beaten egg and coat in a mixture of bread crumbs and parmesan cheese. Place chicken in a baking dish and top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and cheese is melted and bubbly.
